## cts

### urn

```
----------------------------------------
urn:cts:miscella
----------------------------------------
autXX.titYY.lan

aut == author (first three letters)
XX  == birth date (last two numbers of the year)
tit == title (first three letters, except stopwords)
YY  == publication date (last two numbers of the year)
lan == language of publication (iso 639.2)
--------------------
example:

Author:  	Walter Benjamin, born 1892
Title:   	Einbahnstra√üe, publ. 1928
Workpart: 	ben92.ein28.ger

translation example:

Title:		One-Way Street, tr. 1978
Workpart:	ben92.ein28.eng78
----------------------------------------
monXX.titYY.lan

mon == first three letters of "monograph"
XX  == publication date (first two numbers of year)
tit == title (first three letters, except stopwords)
YY  == publication date (last two numbers of the year)
lan == language of publication (iso 639.2)
```
